yt30_lp28.sengokugame.clientSide

Class ClientGameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • yt30_lp28.sengokugame.clientSide.ClientGameModel

  • public class ClientGameModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The Game Model on client side. The Game MVC on client side supports following functions: 1. Visualize the city assignment based on a set of CityIcons.
    Author:
    yt30, lp28
